extendedIngredients.name: beets
extendedIngredients.original: 3 medium beets (1 1/4 pound total without greens), trimmed, leaving 1 inch of stems attached
extendedIngredients.originalName: beets (1 1/4 pound total without greens), trimmed, leaving 1 inch of stems attached

extendedIngredients.name: cumin seeds
extendedIngredients.original: 1 teaspoon cumin seeds, toasted and lightly crushed
extendedIngredients.originalName: cumin seeds, toasted and lightly crushed

title: Roasted Beets with Cumin and Mint
summary: Roasted Beets with Cumin and Mint might be just the side dish you are searching for. This recipe serves 6 and costs 41 cents per serving. One serving contains 63 calories, 1g of protein, and 5g of fat. Not a lot of people made this recipe, and 1 would say it hit the spot. Head to the store and pick up salt, olive oil, lemon juice, and a few other things to make it today. It is a good option if you're following a caveman, gluten free, primal, and whole 30 diet. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes around 75 hours. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 29%. This score is not so super. Try Cumin-Roasted Beets, Roasted Beets with Mint-Yogurt Sauce, and Roasted Beets With Fresh Mint And Chèvre for similar recipes.
instructions: Preparation                                                                    Stir together lemon juice, cumin seeds, salt, and pepper in a medium bowl. Stir in oil and let stand while roasting beets.                                                                            Put oven rack in middle position and preheat oven to 425°F.                                                                            Tightly wrap beets in a double layer of foil and roast on a baking sheet until tender, 1 to 1 1/4  hours. Cool to warm in foil package, about 20 minutes.                                                                            When beets are cool enough to handle, peel them, discarding stems and root ends, then cut into 1/2-inch-wide wedges.                                                                            Toss warm beets with dressing. Stir in mint just before serving.                                                Cooks' note:            Beets can be roasted and tossed with dressing 4 hours ahead, then kept, covered, at room temperature.

steps.step: Stir together lemon juice, cumin seeds, salt, and pepper in a medium bowl. Stir in oil and let stand while roasting beets.
Put oven rack in middle position and preheat oven to 425°F.
Tightly wrap beets in a double layer of foil and roast on a baking sheet until tender, 1 to 1 1/4  hours. Cool to warm in foil package, about 20 minutes.
When beets are cool enough to handle, peel them, discarding stems and root ends, then cut into 1/2-inch-wide wedges.
Toss warm beets with dressing. Stir in mint just before serving.
Beets can be roasted and tossed with dressing 4 hours ahead, then kept, covered, at room temperature.
